quest_desc.qkname: [Nest] Let’s Go to the Secret Party

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Traveller Pri$
Oh, {user_nick}! Here! Over here! What great timing! Have you heard the news?

$Traveller Pri$
(Pri whispers in a very low voice.)
There's going to be a secret party at Riverwort Wharf.
What do you think, {user_nick}? Are you going to check it out?!
<html>$[Nest] Let’s Go to the Secret Party$</html>

$Traveller Pri$
Where was I... Oh, right.The secret party at Riverwort Wharf!
As I was wandering around, I found myself in the middle of a secret rally at Riverwort Wharf.
While there, I did some digging and...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't you think a little more caution was necessary?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
What? You don't have to worry about that. That's not the point!
The important thing is what's going on at the secret rally!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Do dimension travelers have 999 lives? Sneaking in was dangerous enough. I can't believe he snooped around...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
Anyway, hear me out first.
I checked around, and it turns out they were preparing for some kind of party there.
I heard... it's a dance party. And they are going to have a quiz show or something like that.

$Traveller Pri$
I found out they were also preparing games that looked like fun, but then I was discovered by the guards!
It was quite the chase! My heart was pounding because I was so worried I'd drop my hat!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You sure it's okay to just take something like that?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
It wasn't a big deal. I just found a place to hide and noticed they were loading something in boxes and... Tada! I snatched one!
They certainly were determined to catch me! I doubt I'll be going near there anytime soon!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(They wouldn't have chased you if you didn't steal the box!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
What's the problem? There were so many boxes like this, who would care if only one went missing!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Me? You said it is a secret rally, how can I get in there?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
So I'm out, but can you go instead,{user_nick}?
If I set foot there again, my hat will be stolen for sure!
Still, it's a secret party that I don't want to give up on! I'm so disappointed I can't go in person, so please go for me!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I've seen a box like this before... And I know how to open it... But still!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
You don't have to worry about that! I found the way there from Riverwort Wharf!
{user_nick}, I'll give this box to you, so why don't you take it and try to open it?
I think it's a box that has special requirements to open... Do you know how?

$Traveller Pri$
As I expected, {user_nick}! You seem to be collecting unusual things from all over so you know about this!
I'm glad I told you, {user_nick}!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You seem to be the one who is curious about it, Pri...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
And who knows? You might get something nice when you open the box!
Aren't you curious? Huh?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm curious, but...<FONT color=#7e12d2> (I don't know if I can go there without being invited)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
Oh, you're so straightforward... (Pri's face turns red.)
But this is a party, {user_nick}! Glamorous lights, tons of people, dancing! Aren't you excited?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(He only does things his way!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Traveller Pri$
Right? So please check it out for me and tell me about it later!
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

$Traveller Pri$
Then go and sweep up all the rewards!

※ Gigantes Nest can now be entered from Riverwort Wharf.

journal.title: News of a Secret Party
journal.contents:
Pri has information about a secret party at Riverwort Wharf. Go hear what he has to say about the party.

Saint Haven - Traveller Pri
